urls.title: The Welsh Harp Reservoir Clean-Up | Canal & River Trust
urls.description: The Canal and River Trust have looked after the Welsh Harp since it became a charity in 2012, and before that as British Waterways. We are working with our partners in the area to find an efficient and safe solution for the unsightly rubbish on the reservoir bed.
